text: Condition of the Heart is a studio album from Kashif, released in 1985, on Arista Records. It may also refer to: * "Condition of the Heart", a song from the 1985, Kashif album: Condition of the Heart * "Condition of the Heart" (song), a song from the 1985, Prince album: Around the World in a Day == See also == *Heart condition (disambiguation)
title: Condition of the Heart (disambiguation)
